0.5.0:
Hi there.
Version 0.5.0 is a milestone release, it has many of the features that you guys have been asking for such as global high score, varying difficulty levels and some other new features.
I'd first like to thank all the people who took the time to send bug reports, you guys are making the game much better!
I've also noticed that a lot of people are having a hard time getting how the game works and what are the rules, so I ask you all to take the 3 minutes it takes to watch the tutorial or read through the instructions, it really is going to be worth it!
I also want to draw your attention to the new settings menu, it has the high score user name that will appear when you achieve a high score, please take the time to set it so you will get recognition for your achievement
I'm going to let you get to the fun, but before, PLEASE keep reporting, all the features I add are based on users clicking the "report an issue" button.
Last thing: If you want to join the Yaniv project, please know that it is open source and I am looking for people who can help so if you have skills in java, android, graphics design or just have ideas, please click the report an issue button and let me know!
Enjoy the game!
